title: CostlyAI
description: An AI model designed to show travelers and potential residents a list of essential groceries and typical day-to-day expenses, helping to understand better the local cost of living.

title: Bio-in-Link
description: A lightweight, database-free link-in-bio tool where all data is stored directly in the URL. Users can create and share a personalized bio page with social links and custom buttons without requiring backend storage.

title: 8 months in Latin America
description: 5000 words displaying my 8-month long journey across Latin America, blending adventure, challenges, and self-discovery. Created to share raw experiences beyond typical travel blogs.

title: Finding home
description: A map of the places that have left their mark on my life.
